Yeah like the other dude is saying. It's more of being a habit than actually how it is in real life. The thing that happens here is like "I want more!" kind of addiction. This is more about how they trick her brain into thinking that this is a game or job. The more you accomplished the work the more dopamine you get. This makes you happy. So the real cost isn't sex. It's her brain shifting to the point "sex is a game"

@Tamatama Not exactly, hentai changes some things: for example that sex will always be pleasant. In real life, people who become hypersexual end up at a point where they no longer enjoy sex, because the habit becomes a compulsion: that is, people only have sex to calm the anxiety of not having sex, not because they really enjoy it.
